Agile Software Development That Delivers

We’re agile so you can be agile as well. We get that market conditions change, funding sources are in flux, and customers need what they need. That’s why we are proud of our proven development process that’s based on Agile Software Development methodologies. All of our staff is trained on this. This helps us to adapt and overcome challenges so we can bring a level of transparency that our customers value.

Trusted

We understand how important concepts are and we make sure that our process for protecting them you can trust. This also extends to the talent we place with you to help your team thrive.

Talented

Our staff is some of the best that the Balkan’s has to offer augmented by some of the worlds best talent. We are constantly on the lookout for top talent and ways to make our team members better. If you’re looking to augment your team, there is no better way than to let us help you find the right person.

Transparent

We want you to feel comfortable with our progress and our process. That’s why you’ll have direct access to your team as well as all the tools we use to build your solution. We’ll also make sure that the talent we place with you exceeds your expectations.

Talent Recruitment

Need top notch talent to augment and accelerate your team? We have access to the best Balkan’s talent and they are eager to make your organisation successful. We pride ourselves on a rigorous selection process that gets you the right talent for your needs now and in the future.

Services

What We Offer

WEB DEVELOPMENT

We deliver a full package of services that covers all kinds of sectors and markets that suits your stakeholders and goals. Developing a digital web platform for your business will help you be more manageable, reduce costs, save time for your customers, employees and the whole company, and most importantly reach your future customers and increase sales.

ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE

We offer a wide range of data analytics and artificial intelligence services that helps you and facilitates your business activities. By providing data analytics drives your business to make the right decisions, minimising risks and enlarging activities. On the other hand, AI, lower human errors, 24/7 support, faster access to data and digital assistance.

CHAT BOT / VOICE BOT

Our innovative products such as Chat bot and Voice bot will generate and qualify leads, quick solutions for customer support by answering and bringing solutions for customer’s questions, product recommendations, marketing campaigns, etc. So, talk and listen to your customers with advanced technologies and be present to support your customers 24/7 with the use of virtual assistants.

Mobile App Development

We offer solid expertise in mobile application development. From user experience (UX) requirements, to design and visual appearance (UI) into implementation on different platforms. We make sure to deliver your requirements into the mobile app and ensure its functionality.

UX / UI

We offer professional design with an efficient user interface that covers the gap between the human brain and digital products. With a focus on the user’s journey, we ensure to use well reasoning colours, images, fonts, animations, buttons that make the app easier accessible and pleasant to use.

QUALITY ASSURANCE

Delivered services and products to you are ensured and prevented from any errors with the best methods by providing internal process checks, documentation and audit for the software process.

Let's take a look at things you have on your mind.

The Software Product Ownership Transfer process must encompass the transfer of knowledge, skills and abilities required to ensure effective ownership for targeted individuals with the least disruption to ongoing developments.
For systems, we use third-party penetration testing on a quarterly basis to ensure that vulnerabilities are well-scanned and secured against. For the apps, we provide automatic security updates, self-hosting our source code repositories so that anyone on the team can make changes instantly, and require authentication to any sensitive data.
We take pride in offering the most talented engineers to our clients, and our screening process plays a crucial role in ensuring that we meet this commitment. Our comprehensive candidate screening process consists of several stages:
1. Application Review: We start by carefully reviewing each candidate's application, which includes their resume, cover letter, and any relevant work samples. We assess their educational background, professional experience, and technical skills, ensuring they meet the necessary qualifications for the specific role.
2. Technical Skills Assessment: Our candidates undergo a series of technical tests and challenges tailored to the desired skill set. This step allows us to evaluate their problem-solving abilities, programming skills, and overall technical expertise.
3. Behavioral Interviews: We conduct in-depth behavioral interviews to gain insight into each candidate's soft skills, such as communication, teamwork, adaptability, and critical thinking. Our goal is to assess their cultural fit within our organization and their ability to work effectively with our clients.
4. Reference Checks: We reach out to professional references provided by the candidate to verify their employment history, technical abilities, and work ethic. This step helps us ensure that we're getting a well-rounded understanding of their strengths and potential areas for improvement.
5. Client-Specific Requirements: If a client has specific requirements or preferences, we adjust our screening process accordingly. This may involve additional assessments, interviews, or certifications to ensure that the candidate meets the client's unique needs.
By using this rigorous, multi-stage screening process, we consistently identify and offer the most talented software engineers to our clients, providing them with the high-quality technical expertise they need to drive their projects forward.
References are available upon request.
